ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-cos7-x86_64
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.11.* *_cpython

about.description:
Glow is an open-source toolkit for working with genomic data at
biobank-scale and beyond. The toolkit is natively built on Apache Spark,
the leading unified engine for big data processing and machine learning,
enabling the scale of the cloud for genomics workflows.
about.summary: An open-source toolkit for large-scale genomic analysis

about.description:
Glow is an open-source toolkit for working with genomic data at
biobank-scale and beyond. The toolkit is natively built on Apache Spark,
the leading unified engine for big data processing and machine learning,
enabling the scale of the cloud for genomics workflows.
about.summary: An open-source toolkit for large-scale genomic analysis

name: glow
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "glow" %}
{% set pypi_name = "glow.py" %}
{% set version = "2.0.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/projectglow/glow/releases/download/v{{ version }}/{{ pypi_name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 728c33ec92fc68a6fdf34c99315bbf3d2e7f5a68801bef37676eacb8c536b896

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.10
    - pyspark >=3.4.0
    - nptyping >=2.5.0
    - numpy >=1.23.5
    - opt_einsum >=3.2.0
    - pandas >=1.5.3
    - statsmodels >=0.13.5
    - typeguard >=2.13.3

test:
  imports:
    - glow
    - glow.gwas
    - glow.wgr

about:
  home: https://projectglow.io
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: An open-source toolkit for large-scale genomic analysis
  description: |
    Glow is an open-source toolkit for working with genomic data at 
    biobank-scale and beyond. The toolkit is natively built on Apache Spark, 
    the leading unified engine for big data processing and machine learning, 
    enabling the scale of the cloud for genomics workflows.
  doc_url: https://glow.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/projectglow/glow

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - a0x8o
    - henrydavidge
    - karenfeng
    - kianfar77
    - kermany
